title: Data Full Stack Engineer Intern
job_description: Your Role Data Services partners across Enterprise Architecture, Portfolio, Analytics, and Application teams to design and deliver data products that power the enterprise. We build and enhance cloud data lakes, data warehouses, and marts that enable analytics, operational reporting, and advanced insights. As a Full Stack Engineer Intern, you’ll contribute to real projects that improve how we design, build, and operate data products. You’ll work alongside Solution Design Leads, Data Engineers, and Analysts in an agile environment, gaining hands‑on experience with modern cloud data platforms while practicing product thinking and engineering fundamentals.
